content.content: 1. A physician or nurse who is authorized under the laws of Manitoba or Quebec to give a prescription within the scope of their practice is prescribed as an authorized prescriber for the purposes of section 16 of the Act.
content.raw_html: 1. A physician or nurse who is authorized under the laws of Manitoba or Quebec to give a prescription within the scope of their practice is prescribed as an authorized prescriber for the purposes of section 16 of the Act.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
